colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG RAKshA GO MA SA MU tAS SNGON GYI YIG RNYING DANG, MKHAS PA MANG PO'I GSUNGS RGYUN LA GZHI BYAS TSIG ZUR CUNG ZAD BSGRIGS TE BKOD PA'I MTHU STOBS KYIS BDAG DANG SBYIN BDAG KUN GYI TSE SROG BRTAN PA DANG BSOD NAMS LONGS SPYOD DBANG RIGS BRGYUD SNYAN GRAGS RLUNG RTA DAR ZHING 'PHEL BAR RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,YI GE CHAD LHAG CHANG GI NYES PA DANG YAN LAG NYAMS PA SKYON GYI BLI MA YI DAM MKHA' @014B 'GRO CHOS SKYONG RNAMS LA BZOD PAR GSOL, ,MKHAS PA RNAMS KYI BZHUS DAG GO , ,,)
